summary: Iteration 41: Verified all bug fixes reported by user. (1) Lead cards - clicking anywhere opens edit modal - WORKING, (2) Ver link opens external URL in new tab - WORKING, (3) Individual action buttons (Edit, Suggestions, Delete) work with e.stopPropagation - WORKING, (4) Dark mode on System Logs page stats cards - WORKING, (5) Dark mode on Import Logs page stats cards - WORKING, (6) Select All checkbox in System Logs - WORKING (25 logs selected with bulk action bar)
passed_tests: UI: Lead card click opens edit modal - PASSED
UI: Edit button (with e.stopPropagation) opens edit modal - PASSED
UI: Suggestions button opens Clientes Sugeridos modal - PASSED
UI: Delete button found and functional - PASSED
UI: Ver link has target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' - PASSED
UI: System Logs Select All checkbox selects unresolved logs - PASSED
UI: System Logs bulk action bar shows '25 logs seleccionados' - PASSED
UI: Dark mode toggle works - PASSED
UI: System Logs dark mode stats cards have dark:bg-*-900/30 classes - PASSED
UI: Import Logs tab loads with stats (Total: 4, Sucesso: 3, Erros: 1, Campos: 15) - PASSED
UI: Import Logs dark mode works correctly - PASSED

features_verified.feature: Lead Card Click Opens Edit Modal
features_verified.evidence: onClick={() => onEdit(lead)} added to Card component. Modal titled 'Editar Lead' opens with all form fields populated.
All buttons (Edit, Suggestions, Delete) have onClick={(e) => { e.stopPropagation(); ... }} to prevent card click handler from also firing.

features_verified.feature: Ver Link Opens in New Tab
features_verified.evidence: Link has target='_blank', rel='noopener noreferrer', and onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()} to prevent modal opening.

features_verified.feature: Dark Mode on System Logs Stats Cards
features_verified.evidence: All icon containers have dark:bg-*-900/30 classes (blue, yellow, orange, red/gray, purple).

features_verified.feature: Dark Mode on Import Logs Stats Cards
features_verified.evidence: Import logs stats cards also have dark:bg-*-900/30 classes for proper dark mode styling.
toggleSelectAll function selects all unresolved logs. Bulk action bar shows count with 'Limpar Selecção' and 'Marcar como Resolvidos' buttons.

critical_code_review_comments: LeadsKanban.js: Card onClick handler correctly calls onEdit(lead) to open modal
LeadsKanban.js: All action buttons (Edit, Suggestions, Delete) properly use e.stopPropagation() to prevent double-firing
LeadsKanban.js: Ver link uses conditional rendering - only shows clickable link if URL starts with http:// or https://
UnifiedLogsPage.js: All stats card icon containers have proper dark mode classes (dark:bg-*-900/30)
UnifiedLogsPage.js: toggleSelectAll function correctly selects only unresolved logs (filter by !log.resolved)
seed_data_creation: None - used existing leads and logs data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All bug fixes verified as WORKING: (1) Lead card click opens edit modal - onClick handler on Card component, (2) Ver link opens in new tab with target='_blank', (3) Dark mode on logs pages uses dark:bg-*-900/30 classes, (4) Select All checkbox in logs tables works correctly selecting unresolved items.
